answer:
The nurses at ImmunizeBC only answer questions about immunization. Please contact the Tuberculosis Clinic at the BC Centre for Disease Control (604-707-2692). A nurse at the clinic will be able to answer your questions. 
Immunization Nurse
question: I was asked to contact the public health authority within 30 days of entering Canada for the inactive Tuberculosis. Could you tell me how long maximum it will take to finish all of the examination? Since the limited time I will stay in Canada, may I finish the monitoring process next time?
